page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT CLUBS
page.content: ENTERTAINMENT CLUBS THERE IS A BOYS BRIGADE WHICH IS HELD IN THE HAMNAVOE PUBLIC HALL EVERY THURSDAY.THE YOUTH CLUB IS ALSO HELD IN THE HALLTHEY HAVE HAVE DARTS,TABLE TENNIS AND OTHER THING'S.THERE IS A BOATING CLUB IN THE HALL THAT RUN'S THE SAILING CLUB.IN THE SUMMER HOLIDAY'S THE PLAY SCHEME COMES TO BURRA.THEY TAKE US ON TRIP'S.THE BADMINTON CLUB IS HELD IN HAMNAVOE PRIMARY SCHOOL GYM HALL EVERY TUESDAY. THAT SAME NIGHT THE YOGA IS HELD IN THE MAIN HALL OF THE SCHOOL.THE CHILDREN UNDER FIVE GO TO THE PLAY GROUP IN THE OLD SCHOOL.THE BROWNIE'S ARE ALSO HELD IN THE OLD SCHOOL.THE BROWNIE'S IS THE JUNIOR GIRL GUIDE'S.
